statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.BrandID , AA.PersonID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate
, BB.CustomerName , CC.BrandName , DD.PersonName
FROM dbo.LMCustomerBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.LMCustomer BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.CustomerID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.LMBrand CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = CC.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.LMPerson DD WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PersonID = DD.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.CustomerID = #CustomerID#
AND AA.BrandID = #BrandID#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.BrandID , AA.PersonID , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate
, BB.CustomerName , CC.BrandName , DD.PersonName
FROM dbo.LMCustomerBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.LMCustomer BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.CustomerID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.LMBrand CC WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandID = CC.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.LMPerson DD WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PersonID = DD.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.LMCustomerBrand ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, CustomerID, BrandID, PersonID, StartDate, EndDate ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #CustomerID#, #BrandID#, #PersonID#, #StartDate#, #EndDate# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.LMCustomerBrand SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, CustomerID = #CustomerID# , BrandID = #BrandID# , PersonID = #PersonID# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# WHERE ID = #ID#
